description: Generate realistic fake data across 23 categories, from people and finance to internet, images, and more. Accelerate testing, prototyping, seeding, and demos with hundreds of ready-made generators. Customize formats like names, addresses, dates, colors, and IDs to match your scenarios.

tools.name: airline-airline-iataCode
tools.description: Generates a random airline IATA code.

tools.name: airline-airport-iataCode
tools.description: Generates a random airport IATA code.

tools.name: airline-airplane-iataTypeCode
tools.description: Generates a random airplane IATA type code.

tools.name: airline-airplane-name
tools.description: Generates a random airplane model name.

tools.name: airline-recordLocator
tools.description: Generates a random record locator (booking reference number).

allowVisuallySimilarCharacters.description: Whether to allow visually similar characters such as '1' and 'I'.

aircraftType.description: The aircraft type. Can be one of 'narrowbody', 'regional', 'widebody'.

max.description: The maximum number of digits to generate.

min.description: The minimum number of digits to generate.

length.description: The number or range of digits to generate.

addLeadingZeros.description: Whether to pad the flight number up to 4 digits with leading zeros.

tools.name: color-human
tools.description: Returns a random human-readable color name.

tools.name: color-space
tools.description: Returns a random color space name from the worldwide accepted color spaces.

tools.name: color-cssSupportedFunction
tools.description: Returns a random css supported color function name.

tools.name: color-cssSupportedSpace
tools.description: Returns a random css supported color space name.

casing.description: Letter type case of the generated hex color.

prefix.description: Prefix of the generated hex color. Only applied when 'hex' format is used.

includeAlpha.description: Adds an alpha value to the color.
Adds an alpha value to the color.

tools.name: color-colorByCSSColorSpace
tools.description: Returns a random color based on CSS color space specified.

space.description: Color space to generate the color for.

tools.name: commerce-department
tools.description: Returns a department inside a shop.

tools.name: commerce-productName
tools.description: Generates a random descriptive product name.

tools.name: commerce-price
tools.description: Generates a price between min and max (inclusive).

max.description: The maximum price.

min.description: The minimum price.

tools.name: commerce-productAdjective
tools.description: Returns an adjective describing a product.

tools.name: commerce-productMaterial
tools.description: Returns a material of a product.

variant.description: The variant of the identifier to return. Can be either 10 (10-digit format) or 13 (13-digit format).

separator.description: The separator to use in the format.

tools.name: company-catchPhrase
tools.description: Generates a random catch phrase that can be displayed to an end user.

tools.name: company-buzzPhrase
tools.description: Generates a random buzz phrase that can be used to demonstrate data being viewed by a manager.

tools.name: company-catchPhraseAdjective
tools.description: Returns a random catch phrase adjective that can be displayed to an end user.

tools.name: company-catchPhraseDescriptor
tools.description: Returns a random catch phrase descriptor that can be displayed to an end user.

tools.name: company-catchPhraseNoun
tools.description: Returns a random catch phrase noun that can be displayed to an end user.

tools.name: company-buzzAdjective
tools.description: Returns a random buzz adjective that can be used to demonstrate data being viewed by a manager.

tools.name: company-buzzVerb
tools.description: Returns a random buzz verb that can be used to demonstrate data being viewed by a manager.

tools.name: company-buzzNoun
tools.description: Returns a random buzz noun that can be used to demonstrate data being viewed by a manager.

tools.name: database-column
tools.description: Returns a random database column name.

tools.name: database-type
tools.description: Returns a random database column type.

tools.name: date-anytime
tools.description: Generates a random date that can be either in the past or in the future.

refDate.description: The date to use as reference point for the newly generated date.

tools.name: date-past
tools.description: Generates a random date in the past.

years.description: The range of years the date may be in the past.

refDate.description: The date to use as reference point for the newly generated date.

tools.name: date-future
tools.description: Generates a random date in the future.

years.description: The range of years the date may be in the future.

refDate.description: The date to use as reference point for the newly generated date.

tools.name: date-between
tools.description: Generates a random date between the given boundaries.

tools.name: date-betweens
tools.description: Generates random dates between the given boundaries. The dates will be returned in an array sorted in chronological order.

max.description: The maximum number of dates to generate.

min.description: The minimum number of dates to generate.

count.description: The number of dates to generate.

tools.name: date-recent
tools.description: Generates a random date in the recent past.

days.description: The range of days the date may be in the past.

refDate.description: The date to use as reference point for the newly generated date.

tools.name: date-soon
tools.description: Generates a random date in the near future.

days.description: The range of days the date may be in the future.

refDate.description: The date to use as reference point for the newly generated date.

tools.name: date-month
tools.description: Returns a random name of a month.

context.description: Whether to return the name of a month in the context of a date. In some locales this may affect grammar or capitalization.

tools.name: date-weekday
tools.description: Returns a random day of the week.

context.description: Whether to return the day of the week in the context of a date. In some locales this may affect grammar or capitalization.

tools.name: date-timeZone
tools.description: Returns a random IANA time zone name.

tools.name: date-birthdate
tools.description: Returns a random birthdate. By default, the birthdate is generated for an adult between 18 and 80 years old. But you can customize the 'age' range or the 'year' range to generate a more specific birthdate.

refDate.description: The date to use as reference point for the newly generated date.

length.description: The length of the account number.

tools.name: finance-amount
tools.description: Generates a random amount between the given bounds (inclusive).

dec.description: The number of decimal places for the amount.

max.description: The upper bound for the amount.

min.description: The lower bound for the amount.

symbol.description: The symbol used to prefix the amount.

autoFormat.description: If true this method will use Number.toLocaleString(). Otherwise it will use Number.toFixed().

tools.name: finance-bic
tools.description: Generates a random SWIFT/BIC code based on the ISO-9362 format.

includeBranchCode.description: Whether to include a three-digit branch code at the end of the generated code.

tools.name: finance-creditCardCVV
tools.description: Generates a random credit card CVV.

tools.name: finance-creditCardIssuer
tools.description: Returns a random credit card issuer.

tools.name: finance-creditCardNumber
tools.description: Generates a random credit card number.

issuer.description: The name of the issuer (case-insensitive) or the format used to generate one.

tools.name: finance-currency
tools.description: Returns a random currency object, containing code, name, symbol, and numericCode properties.

tools.name: finance-currencyNumericCode
tools.description: Returns a random currency numeric code.

tools.name: finance-ethereumAddress
tools.description: Creates a random, non-checksum Ethereum address.

formatted.description: Return a formatted version of the generated IBAN.

countryCode.description: The country code from which you want to generate an IBAN.

length.description: The length of the unmasked number.

ellipsis.description: Whether to prefix the number with an ellipsis.

maskChar.description: The character to use as a mask.

length.description: The length of the PIN to generate.

tools.name: food-ethnicCategory
tools.description: Generates a random food's ethnic category.

tools.name: git-commitEntry
tools.description: Generates a random commit entry as printed by `git log`.

eol.description: Choose the end of line character to use. 'LF' = '\n', 'CRLF' = '\r\n'

merge.description: Set to `true` to generate a merge message line.

refDate.description: The date to use as reference point for the commit.

tools.name: git-commitDate
tools.description: Generates a date string for a git commit using the same format as `git log`.

refDate.description: The date to use as reference point for the commit.

length.description: The length of the commit sha.

tools.name: hacker-ingverb
tools.description: Returns a random hacker/IT verb for continuous actions (en: ing suffix; e.g. hacking).

tools.name: image-avatar
tools.description: Generates a random avatar image url.

tools.name: image-avatarGitHub
tools.description: Generates a random avatar from GitHub.

tools.name: image-personPortrait
tools.description: Generates a random square portrait (avatar) of a person. These are static images of fictional people created by an AI, Stable Diffusion 3.

sex.description: The sex of the person for the avatar. Can be 'female' or 'male'.

size.description: The size of the image. Can be 512, 256, 128, 64 or 32.

tools.name: image-avatarLegacy
tools.description: Generates a random avatar from `https://cloudflare-ipfs.com/ipfs/Qmd3W5DuhgHirLHGVixi6V76LhCkZUz6pnFt5AJBiyvHye/avatar`. (Deprecated: The links are no longer working. Use `avatar()` instead.)

tools.name: image-urlLoremFlickr
tools.description: Generates a random image url provided via https://loremflickr.com.

category.description: Category to use for the image.

tools.name: image-urlPicsumPhotos
tools.description: Generates a random image url provided via https://picsum.photos.

blur.description: Whether the image should be blurred. 0 disables the blur.

grayscale.description: Whether the image should be grayscale.

tools.name: image-urlPlaceholder
tools.description: Generates a random image url provided via https://via.placeholder.com/. (Deprecated: The service has bad uptime. Use `faker.image.url()` or `faker.image.dataUri()` instead.)

text.description: The text to display on the image.

textColor.description: The text color of the image.

backgroundColor.description: The background color of the image.

tools.name: image-dataUri
tools.description: Generates a random data uri containing an URL-encoded SVG image or a Base64-encoded SVG image.

type.description: The type of the image to return.

color.description: The color of the image. Must be a color supported by svg.

tools.name: internet-email
tools.description: Generates an email address using the given person's name as base.

lastName.description: The optional last name to use. If not specified, a random one will be chosen.

provider.description: The mail provider domain to use. If not specified, a random free mail provider will be chosen.

firstName.description: The optional first name to use. If not specified, a random one will be chosen.

allowSpecialCharacters.description: Whether special characters such as `.!#$%&'*+-/=?^_`{|}~` should be included in the email address.

tools.name: internet-exampleEmail
tools.description: Generates an email address using an example mail provider using the given person's name as base.

lastName.description: The optional last name to use. If not specified, a random one will be chosen.

firstName.description: The optional first name to use. If not specified, a random one will be chosen.

allowSpecialCharacters.description: Whether special characters such as `.!#$%&'*+-/=?^_`{|}~` should be included in the email address.

tools.name: internet-userName
tools.description: Generates a username using the given person's name as base. (Deprecated: Use `faker.internet.username()` instead.)

lastName.description: The optional last name to use. If not specified, a random one will be chosen.

firstName.description: The optional first name to use. If not specified, a random one will be chosen.

tools.name: internet-username
tools.description: Generates a username using the given person's name as base.

lastName.description: The optional last name to use. If not specified, a random one will be chosen.

firstName.description: The optional first name to use. If not specified, a random one will be chosen.

tools.name: internet-displayName
tools.description: Generates a display name using the given person's name as base.

lastName.description: The optional last name to use. If not specified, a random one will be chosen.

firstName.description: The optional first name to use. If not specified, a random one will be chosen.

tools.name: internet-protocol
tools.description: Returns a random web protocol. Either `http` or `https`.

tools.name: internet-httpStatusCode
tools.description: Generates a random HTTP status code.

types.description: A list of the HTTP status code types that should be used.

appendSlash.description: Whether to append a slash to the end of the url (path).

tools.name: internet-ip
tools.description: Generates a random IPv4 or IPv6 address.

network.description: The optional network to use. This is intended as an alias for well-known `cidrBlock`s.

cidrBlock.description: The optional CIDR block to use. Must be in the format `x.x.x.x/y`.

tools.name: internet-userAgent
tools.description: Generates a random user agent string.

tools.name: internet-color
tools.description: Generates a random css hex color code in aesthetically pleasing color palette. (Deprecated: Please use faker.color.rgb() or any of the other color methods instead.)

redBase.description: The optional base red in range between `0` and `255`.

blueBase.description: The optional base blue in range between `0` and `255`.

greenBase.description: The optional base green in range between `0` and `255`.

separator.description: The optional separator to use. Can be either `':'`, `'-'` or `''`.

length.description: The length of the password to generate.

pattern.description: The pattern that all chars should match.

memorable.description: Whether the generated password should be memorable.

types.description: A list of the emoji types that should be included.

tools.name: internet-jwtAlgorithm
tools.description: Generates a random JWT (JSON Web Token) Algorithm.

tools.name: internet-jwt
tools.description: Generates a random JWT (JSON Web Token).

header.description: The header to use for the token.

payload.description: The payload to use for the token.

refDate.description: The date to use as reference point for the newly generated date.

tools.name: location-cardinalDirection
tools.description: Returns a random cardinal direction (north, east, south, west).

abbreviated.description: If true this will return abbreviated directions (N, E, etc).

tools.name: location-city
tools.description: Generates a random localized city name.

tools.name: location-countryCode
tools.description: Returns a random ISO_3166-1 country code.

variant.description: The code to return. Can be either 'alpha-2', 'alpha-3', or 'numeric'.

tools.name: location-county
tools.description: Returns a random localized county, or other equivalent second-level administrative entity for the locale's country such as a district or department.

tools.name: location-direction
tools.description: Returns a random direction (cardinal and ordinal; northwest, east, etc).

abbreviated.description: If true this will return abbreviated directions (NW, E, etc).

max.description: The upper bound for the latitude to generate.

min.description: The lower bound for the latitude to generate.

precision.description: The number of decimal points of precision for the latitude.

max.description: The upper bound for the longitude to generate.

min.description: The lower bound for the longitude to generate.

precision.description: The number of decimal points of precision for the longitude.

tools.name: location-nearbyGPSCoordinate
tools.description: Generates a random GPS coordinate within the specified radius from the given coordinate.

origin.description: The original coordinate to get a new coordinate close to.

radius.description: The maximum distance from the given coordinate to the new coordinate.

isMetric.description: If true assume the radius to be in kilometers. If false for miles.

tools.name: location-ordinalDirection
tools.description: Returns a random ordinal direction (northwest, southeast, etc).

abbreviated.description: If true this will return abbreviated directions (NW, SE, etc).

tools.name: location-secondaryAddress
tools.description: Generates a random localized secondary address. This refers to a specific location at a given address such as an apartment or room number.

tools.name: location-state
tools.description: Returns a random state, or other equivalent first-level administrative entity for the locale's country such as a province, region, or prefecture.

abbreviated.description: If true this will return abbreviated state names.

tools.name: location-streetAddress
tools.description: Generates a random localized street address.

useFullAddress.description: When true this will generate a full address. Otherwise it will just generate a street address.

tools.name: location-zipCode
tools.description: Generates a random localized zip code.

state.description: The state to generate a zip code for.

format.description: The format the zip code should use.

tools.name: lorem-word
tools.description: Generates a word of a specified length.

max.description: The maximum length of the word.

min.description: The minimum length of the word.

length.description: The expected length of the word.

strategy.description: The strategy to apply when no words with a matching length are found. Available strategies: 'fail', 'shortest', 'closest', 'longest', 'any-length'.

tools.name: lorem-words
tools.description: Generates a space separated list of words.

max.description: The maximum number to generate.

min.description: The minimum number to generate.

count.description: The number of words to generate.

tools.name: lorem-sentence
tools.description: Generates a space separated list of words beginning with a capital letter and ending with a period.

max.description: The maximum number to generate.

min.description: The minimum number to generate.

wordCount.description: The number of words that should be in the sentence.

tools.name: lorem-slug
tools.description: Generates a slugified text consisting of the given number of hyphen separated words.

max.description: The maximum number to generate.

min.description: The minimum number to generate.

wordCount.description: The number of words to generate.

tools.name: lorem-sentences
tools.description: Generates the given number of sentences.

separator.description: The separator to add between sentences.

max.description: The maximum number to generate.

min.description: The minimum number to generate.

sentenceCount.description: The number of sentences to generate.

tools.name: lorem-paragraph
tools.description: Generates a paragraph with the given number of sentences.

max.description: The maximum number to generate.

min.description: The minimum number to generate.

sentenceCount.description: The number of sentences to generate.

tools.name: lorem-paragraphs
tools.description: Generates the given number of paragraphs.

max.description: The maximum number to generate.

min.description: The minimum number to generate.

paragraphCount.description: The number of paragraphs to generate.

tools.name: lorem-text
tools.description: Generates a random text based on a random lorem method.

tools.name: lorem-lines
tools.description: Generates the given number lines of lorem separated by '\n'.

max.description: The maximum number to generate.

min.description: The minimum number to generate.

lineCount.description: The number of lines to generate.

sex.description: The optional sex to use. Can be either 'female' or 'male'.
The optional sex to use. Can be either 'female' or 'male'.
The optional sex to use. Can be either 'female' or 'male'.

lastName.description: The optional last name to use. If not specified a random one will be chosen.

firstName.description: The optional first name to use. If not specified a random one will be chosen.

tools.name: person-sexType
tools.description: Returns a random sex type. The `SexType` is intended to be used in parameters and conditions.

sex.description: The optional sex to use. Can be either 'female' or 'male'.

style.description: Style of the generated phone number: 'human' (default), 'national', or 'international'.

tools.name: science-chemicalElement
tools.description: Returns a random periodic table element.

tools.name: system-fileName
tools.description: Returns a random file name with extension.

max.description: Maximum number.

min.description: Minimum number.

extensionCount.description: Define how many extensions the file name should have.

tools.name: system-commonFileName
tools.description: Returns a random file name with a given extension or a commonly used extension.

tools.name: system-commonFileType
tools.description: Returns a commonly used file type.

tools.name: system-commonFileExt
tools.description: Returns a commonly used file extension.

interfaceType.description: The interface type. Can be one of 'en', 'wl', 'ww'.

interfaceSchema.description: The interface schema. Can be one of 'index', 'slot', 'mac', 'pci'.

includeYear.description: Whether to include a year in the generated expression.

includeNonStandard.description: Whether to include a '@yearly', '@monthly', '@daily', etc text labels in the generated expression.

tools.name: vehicle-vrm
tools.description: Returns a vehicle registration number (Vehicle Registration Mark - VRM).
